1122954722887991297.text: Brigadier Leonard Parrington threatens Hinton with court-martial for using offensive language to a superior officer. Sgt. Hinton threatens to shoot the Brigadier for "defeatist" order to surrender.pic.twitter.com/DhBIViLXhP

1122586612762849285.text: German Army High Command orders all units to "fully collaborate" with SS during planned invasion of the USSR: despite officers' misgivings, Wehrmacht will assist with killing Soviet commissars & any other Nazi targets.

1122889214847221760.text: Forged Hitler passport lists his distinguishing features as "small moustache"; red J stamp on the cover is Nazi symbol for "Jew":pic.twitter.com/mEDOo5BZg3

1122888430126551040.text: British Special Operations Executive- smuggling spies into occupied Europe- demonstrate their forgery skills by creating a perfect German passport- for Adolf Hitler.pic.twitter.com/h75KcROOFa

1122482612637962240.text: German General Keitel reports from conquered Greece: "Hitler wants no insult to Greek pride, no triumphal parade into Athens. But Mussolini insists on a glorious entry for his troops."

1123285699673903104.text: Germany announces conquered Yugoslavia will be dismembered by its invaders: territory under German occupation, or annexed by Italy, Hungary, Bulgaria. "Independent" Croatia ruled by Nazi puppet govt.pic.twitter.com/Xf0BN6cWbL

1122979744516067328.text: "The brigadier, whoever he was, a Pommie, I think, had unconditionally surrendered to the Germans, who had offered him annihilation bombing if he didn't." Hear from Bill: https://nzhistory.govt.nz/media/sound/pow-capture-bill-flint …

1122611982287495168.text: New Gallup polling shows 81% of Americans are against going to war with Germany & Italy- but 68% would be willing to fight if it was the only way to stop an Axis victory.

1122969835510599681.text: Despite heroic defence from New Zealanders, Kalamata has fallen to the Germans- Allied 18th brigade taken prisoner (including Sgt. Hinton, with a bullet in his stomach).

1122957980385906690.text: Leading a squad of 12 men, Jack Hinton charges a German artillery piece & wipes out crew with grenades, before storming two machine-gun nests with his bayonet. "I didn't like the way things were going."pic.twitter.com/CEjjT6WCLJ

1122548064374480896.text: Lindbergh, advocates “America First” isolationism, avoiding confrontation with the Nazis: "Britain's plan is to lure American men to die in this fiasco of a war."pic.twitter.com/eNP4HQTynu

1122254271850921984.text: 3 Allied ships evacuating troops from Greece have been sunk by Luftwaffe dive-bombers: 983 British, Australians & New Zealanders are dead, survivors adrift in Aegean Sea.

1122608784742830080.text: Menzies: "Winston [Churchill] is a great man, but he is more addicted to wishful thinking every day."

1122978495129427970.text: NZ soldier Bill Flint is in Kalamata: "From the wharf's edge, we saw the last evacuation ship zoom past, loud-hailing: 'Sorry boys, it's late, got to go."

1122596375097761793.text: Australian Prime Minister Robert Menzies is attending British War Cabinet in London: "Terrible anxiety over Greece- Winston says 'We'll lose only 5000'- in fact we'll lose over 15,000 men."

1122953987391668226.text: Allied troops have been surrounded by Germans at Kalamata, Greece; retreat cut off, they're ordered to surrender. New Zealand Sgt. Jack Hinton responds: "Fuck that, who'll come with me?"

1122484397666635777.text: Keitel: "The miserable spectacle of the Italians, our gallant allies, triumphantly marching into Athens produced some hollow laughter from Greeks."

1123173331614695424.text: Operation Demon- Allied evacuation of mainland Greece- is over. 50,000+ men rescued. Over 1000 are dead from 26 ships sunk by Luftwaffe, & 9000 taken prisoner.pic.twitter.com/VCvSDOns0d

1123211511139270657.text: With Greek mainland conquered, Hitler has set a new, "final" date for much-delayed Operation Barbarossa. Germany will invade the USSR on 22 June this year.

1122547316240592896.text: American isolationist leader & celebrity pilot Charles Lindbergh has resigned his commission as a US Army Air Corps Colonel- to protest "Democrat warmongering".
